title: Beyond the Hallow Grave
description: Children beware, and please give care of things that go bump in the night.It all seems like fun when you provoke mayhem and run through the graveyard to give one a fright.Please heed our warning from dusk until morning giving caution to the naive.Goblins and Ghouls wait on the foolishly brave to pull beyond the hallow grave.
author: M.M. Ward
